information: CEMENA, located in Montpellier, France, is a craft company that makes natural soaps and cosmetics. We have created our own brand of cosmetics enriched with goat's milk from our family farm. At CEMENA, we are certain that the simplest things are the best. That is why we like developing simple but effective formulas to meet the needs of your skin and hair. Our manufacturing laboratory is located in Montpellier, France. We prefer to purchase raw materials from local producers and French suppliers. We can work with you if you have a project for creating and manufacturing a natural cosmetic product. Working with our various partners we can handle all aspects of private label production: manufacture, design and packaging. Our industrial capacity enables us to deliver projects in runs from 250 pieces all the way to 30, 000 monthly.
